mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item ( rsm_id, itm_form_id, itm_title, itm_content, u_id, itm_reg_dt, itm_seq, itm_use_yn ) VALUES ( #{rsm_id}, ITEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{itm_title}, #{itm_content}, #{u_id}, sysdate, #{item_seq}, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT rsm_id, itm_form_id, itm_prd_id, itm_title, itm_content, u_id, itm_reg_dt, itm_seq, itm_use_yn, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY level) AS totalNo FROM item WHERE rsm_id = 9 AND itm_use_yn = 1 START WITH itm_prd_id IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR itm_form_id = itm_prd_id

SELECT rsm_id, itm_form_id, itm_prd_id, itm_title, itm_content, u_id, itm_reg_dt, itm_seq, itm_use_yn FROM item WHERE u_id = #{u_id} AND itm_use_yn = 1 START WITH itm_prd_id IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR itm_form_id = itm_prd_id
